H0.text: What was the Christian name of the wife of composer Robert Schumann. Amalia

H1.text: What was the Christian name of the wife of composer Robert Schumann. Josephine

H2.text: What was the Christian name of the wife of composer Robert Schumann. Elisabeth

H3.text: What was the Christian name of the wife of composer Robert Schumann. CLARA

A4.text: Clara Josephine Schumann (; German: [ˈklaːʁa ˈʃuːman]; née Wieck; 13 September 1819 – 20 May 1896) was a German pianist, composer, and piano teacher and prodigy.

A5.text: She married the composer Robert Schumann, on 12 September 1840, and the couple had eight children.
